HotelElement.Name: Bay of Palms Resort Gold Coast

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Elanora, Bay of Palms is on a lake and convenient to Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary and Surf World Gold Coast. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Currumbin Beach and Tugun Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 66 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Wired and wireless Internet access is available (surcharge). Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include phones, as well as coffee/tea makers and ceiling fans.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and babysitting/childcare. Additional amenities include an arcade/game room, a picnic area, and barbecue grills.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.
